name: Sneasler
description: The Free Climb Pokémon. Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is not holding an item, it gains 10 feet to its speed.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: On melee attacks made by this Pokémon, roll a d10 on a hit. On a result of a 10, the target is poisoned.
